Thirst is thrown back with a damaged face, but charges again at Lady 
Right (because I doubt LN would let Void fight fair), but fires a 
blast of plasma sideways at Void.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> As Thirst lept at Lady right, Void stepped in front and just stood 
there. A 
> second later his cloak slowly opened as a small object flew out from 
its 
> confines and exploded in front of thirst with the power of a really 
large 
> missile.
